def_cn: 教学的，学业的（尤指学识方面而非实践、技能上的）
def_en: Academic is used to describe things that relate to the work done in schools, colleges, and universities, especially work which involves studying and reasoning rather than practical or technical skills.
Academic is used to describe things that relate to schools, colleges, and universities.

def_cn: 学术的,重研究与思辨的（与重实践或技能相对）
def_en: Academic is used to describe work, or a school, college, or university, that places emphasis on studying and reasoning rather than on practical or technical skills.
Someone who is academic is good at studying.

def_cn: 大学教师；高校科研人员
def_en: An academic is a member of a university or college who teaches or does research.

def_cn: 学究式的；空谈的；不切实际的
def_en: You can say that a discussion or situation is academic if you think it is not important because it has no real effect or cannot happen.
